title: Super Spacious Two Bed - Steps from Tuft's and Davis Square
posting_body: This centrally located two-bed will not last!
This two-bedroom offering has a huge living room and two equally sized bedrooms with a great amount of closet space.
Located in the perfect Somerville location, super close to Tuft's University, Davis Square, and Ball Square!
Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!
